text: Bimont is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== Bimont is a small village situated some 8 miles(13 km) northeast of Montreuil-sur-Mer, on the D152 road. A map of the commune ==Population== ==See also== * Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de- Calais
title: Bimont
